scripts.start: echo 'Run a project using npm run serve --labs:project=src-tests/camera-duplicate.js'
scripts.build: NODE_PATH=./node_modules browserify $npm_package_config_input -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t glslify  | uglifyjs -cm > $npm_package_config_output
scripts.serve: NODE_PATH=./node_modules budo $npm_package_config_input --dir static --open -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t glslify
